title: Homeland Security secretary says a border wall won't be built all at once
text: Nonetheless, the administration is also looking at ways to step up background checks on citizens from the seven countries before they travel, such as demanding social media account passwords, Kelly said. Most of those nations have unreliable police forces or lack identity systems to help confirm travelers are who they say they are, he said.
summary:
Nonetheless, the administration is also looking at ways to step up background checks on citizens from the seven countries before they travel, such as demanding social media account passwords, Kelly said.
Most of those nations have unreliable police forces or lack identity systems to help confirm travelers are who they say they are, he said.
